instruction: Compare the differences between robots and humans.
output: Humans and robots differ in many regards. Humans possess intelligence, creativity and emotions, whereas robots are built to follow programmed instructions. Humans have bodies with senses to interact with the environment, whereas robots only have the capability to interact with reality based on preprogrammed facts and rules. Additionally, robots can automate processes and complete tasks more efficiently and accurately than humans, while humans often take longer to complete tasks.
